spell.name: Condense water beads
spell.school:
EV Hydromancer 1 action 120 feet V, S Instantaneous Condense water into 5 beads to use as projectiles at enemies or as accessories for later use
At Higher levels: using level 2 spell slots or higher, you create 1 more bead for each spell above 1st.
